text: Abies nordmanniana, the Nordmann fir or Caucasian fir, is a fir tree. It grows in the mountains south and east of the Black Sea, in Turkey, Georgia and the Russian Caucasus. It occurs at altitudes of 900â€“2,200 m on mountains with a rainfall of over 1,000 mm. == References == Category:Conifers Category:Plants of Asia Category:Europe
title: Abies nordmanniana
